ygData.subject: RE: experience
ygData.msgSnippet: Maybe your right.  Maybe its less then hybrids only.  Hmmmmm Bruener ... From: Trent Carroll [mailto:trent@hbu.edu] Sent: Tuesday, November 23, 1999 4:12 PM
ygData.messageBody:
Maybe your right. Maybe its less then hybrids only. Hmmmmm

Bruener

-----Original Message-----
From: Trent Carroll [mailto:trent@...]
Sent: Tuesday, November 23, 1999 4:12 PM
To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
Subject: RE: [warriors_eq] experience


From: "Trent Carroll" <trent@...>

My understanding is that a warrior is supposed to have the least amount of
exp required per level. I haven't seen numbers on a monk or ran my own
controlled experiment to compare, but it seemed like the monk required a
significant amount more exp last time I ran one. Don't quote me on that
though.

Kindrael

For the Honor and Glory of the Warlord, Rallos Zek!
